name: Christmas Swipe - Happy Santas Slice Game!
name_original: Christmas Swipe - Happy Santas Slice Game!
description:
It's Christmas time and Santa is on the loose! Cut, slice, slash and dash your way through over 50 levels of Christmas fun! It's time to corner those crazy Santas and you'll need quick fingers and sharp thinking to avoid the cutting the Santas in half...

Set to an awesome action soundtrack with epic graphics, this classic slash game will keep you entertained for hours.

The festive season has never been this fun!
